decision_conditions: 2 The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers 001, 101, 201, 202, 301 Revised 12th September 2022, 401 (NMA - revised) received 26-05-23, 402 (NMA - revised) received 26-05-23, 403 (NMA - revised) received 26-05-23, 404 (NMA - revised) received 26-05-23, 405 (NMA - revised) received 26-05-23 and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.

description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 41627/APP/2022/2128, dated 16-09-2022 (Erection of two storey, two-bed dwelling with associated parking and amenity space provision, including demolition of existing garages at land to rear of 21 & 21A Hatherleigh Road.) to continue the brickwork finish to all ground floor walls.
